about_the_game:
A long time ago, in view of the widespread chaos caused by demonic creatures, a clan was created by very powerful men: the "Umbra Sicarius" clan. They created towers scattered around the world at specific points to imprison these creatures. At one point, in the Red Tower, an unknown creature with immense power emerged, becoming a terrible threat. It was at this moment that the Guardian Responsible for Red Tower swung into action.



The game is an 8-way TopDown shooter, with bullet hell and Rogue like elements. The Tower has 50 levels that are randomly selected until you reach the top. You will face hordes of enemies in small rooms, your objective will be to destroy the portals of hell and eliminate the focus of demons inside the Red Tower.




You will be a Gunslinger Wizard who uses a Magic Wand and a Firearm to destroy your enemies, these weapons will be able to obtain improvements for each defeated Boss by collecting the Corrupted Seal Fragments.



The game allows you to replay on a higher difficulty after completing it, keeping all your upgrades already acquired in the previous campaign, releasing new parameter upgrades such as life, mana among others, "Newplus" has two levels the "NewPlus+ ” and “NewPlus++”.

short_description: The most violent creatures from darkness were arrested inside the Red Tower. An evil force capable of destroying it was discovered, putting all of mankind at risk. Shoot the monsters, upgrade your weapons, rise to more challenging levels, and destroy 'em all 'til not a single one is left!
